subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=64|rad=手|as=12|sn=15|canj=QORM|four=|ids=⿰扌翕}}

# (same as [[搨]]) to take a rubbing of an inscription on stone
# etc.
# (same as [[拉]]) to pull, to drag, to hold
# to beat, to strike, to attack
# (same as [[拹]]) to break, to destroy, to smash
